top_categories.workout_context: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo's Tennessee delta gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Rust Buster Gravel Fondo's Tennessee delta, Southern gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 50 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Rust Buster Gravel Fondo's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Rust Buster Gravel Fondo. Train it until it feels boring.
50 miles on Tennessee delta gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
At Rust Buster Gravel Fondo, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
When someone attacks on Tennessee delta gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Rust Buster Gravel Fondo, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Base fitness for Rust Buster Gravel Fondo. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
2-minute all-out efforts on Tennessee delta gravel. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
Smooth pedaling at 50 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Rust Buster Gravel Fondo’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Rust Buster Gravel Fondo requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on tennessee delta gravel to build confidence. Expect: tennessee delta, southern gravel, southeast us.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 50 miles of tennessee delta gravel in Memphis, TN.
